code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> Idle
    Idle --> Loading: Start Request
    Loading --> Success: Data Received
    Loading --> Error: Request Failed
    Success --> Idle: Reset
    Error --> Idle: Retry
    Error --> [*]: Abort

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我们从头开始，先确定入口点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是Generic Diagram应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达Generic Diagram结束。
